metadata.name: NavigationMolecular
metadata.description: Close mobile menu when resizing to desktop

stateMachine.mermaidDiagram:
stateDiagram-v2
    isMobileMenuOpenFalse : isMobileMenuOpen is false
    isMobileMenuOpenTrue : isMobileMenuOpen is true
    disabled : Component is disabled
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    [*] --> default
    default --> hover : mouse enter
    hover --> default : mouse leave
    default --> focus : tab/click
    focus --> default : blur
    default --> loading : async action
    loading --> default : action complete
    default --> error : error occurred
    error --> default : reset

renderedMarkdown:
NavigationMolecular State Machine

Overview

Close mobile menu when resizing to desktop

Component States

Logical States

isMobileMenuOpenFalse

  • Description: isMobileMenuOpen is false
  • Triggers: setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)
  • CSS Classes: Close menu
  • Props: {"isMobileMenuOpen":false}

isMobileMenuOpenTrue

  • Description: isMobileMenuOpen is true
  • Triggers: setIsMobileMenuOpen(true)
  • CSS Classes: Close menu
  • Props: {"isMobileMenuOpen":true}

disabled

  • Description: Component is disabled
  • Triggers: disabled prop true
  • CSS Classes: opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed pointer-events-none
  • Props: {"disabled":true}

CSS States & Styling

default

borderColor: var(--color-border);
backgroundColor: var(--color-background);
color: var(--color-text-primary);

Classes: border rounded-lg px-4 py-2
Pseudo-states: :hover, :focus, :active

hover

backgroundColor: var(--color-background-hover);
borderColor: var(--color-border-hover);
transform: translateY(-1px);

Classes: hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-gray-300
Pseudo-states: :hover

focus

borderColor: var(--color-primary);
borderWidth: 2px;

Classes: focus:border-dashed focus:border-2 focus:border-blue-500
Pseudo-states: :focus, :focus-visible

State Transitions

stateDiagram-v2
    isMobileMenuOpenFalse : isMobileMenuOpen is false
    isMobileMenuOpenTrue : isMobileMenuOpen is true
    disabled : Component is disabled
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    [*] --> default
    default --> hover : mouse enter
    hover --> default : mouse leave
    default --> focus : tab/click
    focus --> default : blur
    default --> loading : async action
    loading --> default : action complete
    default --> error : error occurred
    error --> default : reset

CSS Custom Properties

Following InternetFriends design system:

:root {
  --color-primary: #3b82f6;
  --color-border: #e5e7eb;
  --color-border-hover: #d1d5db;
  --color-background: #ffffff;
  --color-background-hover: #f9fafb;
  --color-text-primary: #111827;
}

Focus States

InternetFriends style focus states use 2px dashed borders:

.component:focus-visible {
  border: 2px dashed var(--color-primary);
  outline: none;
}

Animation Transitions

.component {
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

Usage Examples

// Default state
<NavigationMolecular />

// Loading state
<NavigationMolecular loading />

// Error state
<NavigationMolecular error="Something went wrong" />

// Success state
<NavigationMolecular success />

Testing States

// Test all states
describe('NavigationMolecular States', () => {
  it('renders default state', () => {
    render(<NavigationMolecular />);
  });
  
  it('renders loading state', () => {
    render(<NavigationMolecular loading />);
  });
  
  it('handles error state', () => {
    render(<NavigationMolecular error="Test error" />);
  });
});
